statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); git_branch=''; [ -d "$cwd/.git" ] && git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" && git -c "gc.autodetach=false" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); kube_ctx=$(kubectl config current-context 2>/dev/null | sed 's/.*\/\([^/]*\)$/\1/'); aws_profile=${AWS_VAULT:-${AWS_PROFILE}}; printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[34m%s\033[0m' "$user@$host" "$cwd"; [ -n "$git_branch" ] && printf ' \033[32m%s\033[0m' "$git_branch"; [ -n "$kube_ctx" ] && printf ' \033[33m☸ %s\033[0m' "$kube_ctx"; [ -n "$aws_profile" ] && printf ' \033[35m☁ %s\033[0m' "$aws_profile"; printf ' \033[90m[%s]\033[0m' "$model"
